title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Poorest States Inclusive Growth (PSIG) Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance for Poorest States Inclusive Growth (PSIG) Programme) is a component of Poorest States Inclusive Growth Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £27,684,904. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Financial policy and administrative management, Formal sector financial intermediaries, Informal/semi-formal financial intermediaries, Education/training in banking and financial services, Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India LLP, International Finance Corporation, KPMG India, KPMG LLP, PwC India, Small Industries Development Bank of India. The start date is 01-07-2008 and the end date is 30-09-2020.

participating-org.narrative: Small Industries Development Bank of India

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Education/training in banking and financial services
